mapper.insert: insert into crm_documentary (id, opportunity_id, type_id, documentary_time, detail, enclosure_info, create_name, create_id, create_time) values(#{id}, #{opportunityId}, #{typeId}, #{documentaryTime}, #{detail}, #{enclosureInfo}, #{createName}, #{createId}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.opportunity_id opportunityId, a.type_id typeId, CONVERT(a.documentary_time, char) documentaryTime, a.detail, a.enclosure_info enclosureInfo FROM crm_documentary a WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE crm_documentary
opportunity_id = #{opportunityId},
type_id = #{typeId},
documentary_time = #{documentaryTime},
detail = #{detail},
enclosure_info = #{enclosureInfo}
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, CONCAT(d.name, '-', b.title) opportunityName, c.name typeName, CONVERT(a.documentary_time, char) documentaryTime, a.create_name createName, a.detail, a.enclosure_info enclosureInfo FROM crm_documentary a LEFT JOIN crm_opportunity b ON a.opportunity_id = b.id LEFT JOIN crm_documentary_type c ON a.type_id = c.id LEFT JOIN crm_customer d ON d.id = b.customer_id WHERE a.id = #{id}
